title: Motorized Saris Door County bike rack is easier to load heavy bikes, plus new 4-in-1 Thru Axle Adapter
content:
Like bicycles themselves, bike racks are rapidly evolving. The proliferation of e-bikes means that many bikes are now heavier, and have frames that may be more difficult to lift and install on traditional bike racks. So instead of adding a ramp so riders can push their bikes from the ground to the rack, Saris just

The post Motorized Saris Door County bike rack is easier to load heavy bikes, plus new 4-in-1 Thru Axle Adapter appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
